"A.P.242/2/15 11:00": "Ahh, welcome back everyone... Guess you finished up your meeting."
"Alma, are you alright? You don't look well."
"I'd fake it if I could, but you're right."
"I feeeeel liiiike craaaap... Just like I used to after fighting. How nostalgic..."
"Hmm... I wonder if I could've done something about that Shiva girl showing up..."
"Or maybe it was all my fault... I had to keep that barrier up to stop the Photon absorption, so I could not just come back..."

"Ah, it's fiiine. It's probably not that serious...
Though I dunno if I'll get better."

"Hahahaha. Getting all excited won't help...
I've gotta take it nice and slow."
"...Sorry, you two. I don't wanna make myself disappear, so I'm gonna take a break from fighting for a while."
"Yeah, guess I'll just have to take some time off."
